title: WATCH: Memphis Depay scores stunning winner for Lyon against PSG
description: Memphis Depay scored a superb late winner to give Lyon a 2-1 win over Paris Saint-Germain on Sunday.
content: The game looked to be heading for a stalemate after Nabil Fekir opened the scoring for Lyon with a brilliant free-kick and Layvin Kurzawa drew PSG level on the stroke of half-time.However, former Manchester United winger Depay snatched victory for Lyon in injury time when he cut inside and fired home.It is only PSG's second defeat of the season in Ligue 1 and sees Lyon close the gap on the leaders to eight points.Hit play on the video at the top of the page to watch Depay's strike
